Text: Pitiful, just pitiful! I seeded out over 40 people yesterday and only 2 stuck around. I guess that answers the question as to going through the trouble of posing anymore Wagon Train, just pitiful!

Hi Jerry, thank you for posting Season 5.
very sorry to hear about the hit and runs.
you still have some of us who seed. been seeding wagon train for almost a year. Also still seeding Rawhide.
Please continue to post for us, but I understand if you stop after this season.
Cheers
